Лойс

Всем любителям стрелялок - обязательно нужно поиграть! Хотя я уверен, что все они в неё играли.

Проходил эту игру тысячу раз.
Это классическая стрелялка от первого лица с отличным игровым шаблоном - опыт игрока тонко с оркестрован. Сильно развито пространственное взаимоотношение игрока с миром. Отличная физика, есть простые физические голволомки. На момент выпуска игра распологала на то время продвинутую систему лицевой анимации - персонажи дейстивтельно живые и правдоподопные.
Отличная атмосфера, интересный вымышленный мир, история и сюжет. Игровой процесс разнообразный, имеет занимательную прогрессию, так что фактор скуки пониженный.

Игровой мир довольно глубок, имея свои загадки. Игроку всё не объясняют, так что ему/ей по большей части придётся всё додумывать самостоятельно. История отчасти повествуется не словами, а действиями и общими картинами. Персонажи уникальны, продуманы и взаимосвязаны между собой, включая главного героя, который, однако, всё время молчит.

Что насчёт графики, то на момент 2015 года она немножко устарела. Её можно улучшить с помощью некоторых модов. Один из таких называется Cinematic Mod, который переделывает все туры, добавляет красивые графические эффекты и повышает сложность, и тем самым увеличивая удовольствие от повторного переигрывания.

Игра отличная. Тянет на десяточку.

Half Life 2...well, my original review was less than positive, as I gave it a punishing 4/10. After replaying Half Life 2, I've appreciated it more, but it still has some really glaring issues.

Now, Half Life 2 is pretty much a must-own for any Steam gamer, as it offers a view of a truly revolutionary game. However, its main issues lie mostly in the overall length and story. So a large portion of the game (specifically the Highway, Sandtraps, and Nova Prospekt levels) feel like filler and drag on for far too long, and end up getting really tedious. You're also stripped of story for almost the entire middle section.

Half Life 2 really shines in the beginning and end levels. The first level in the game is perhaps the best introduction of any game I've ever played, and the following levels are strong as well. The ending levels are also excellent.

Overall, Half Life 2 is really a game anyone should buy, just don't expect it to outshine every other FPS.

Best Single-Player FPS out there. 9.8/10. This game just does something different than every single repetitve FPS shooter out there. Maybe characters that you actually care about? Or unique enemies? Perhaps its the atmosphere and the details? Though graphic quality is not the best, even though they were OUTSTANDING during 2004 (You should be ashamed of yourself if you play a game just for graphics anyway) This game offers an outstanding story, with immersive battles, absolutely beautiful soundtrack, and just all over, unique from all other FPS shooters, There also is a continuation of this (Half-Life 2: Episode 1 & 2) for those who want more of this amazing game. The only downside for this is, the story is never finished, our only hope is waiting for Half-Life 3.......

http://store.steampowered.com/app/290930/HalfLife_2_Update/

[h1]"O Clássico e Lendário Gordon Freeman"[/h1]

[h1]"The right man in the wrong place can make all the difference in the world."[/h1]
[b]"O homem certo no lugar errado pode fazer toda diferença do mundo"[/b]

[h1]"..."[/h1]
[b]- Gordon Freeman[/b]

[h1]Half-Life 2:[/h1]
[strike](Meia-Vida 2 é uma simulação de um idoso que viveu sua vida)[/strike] 

Foi um dos jogos renovaram os jogos de [u]FPS (Tiro em Primeira Pessoa)[/u], você deverá sobreviver contra soldados, zombie, aliens e outras coisas capetadas.

O [b]Half-Life 2[/b] é muito conhecido pelo seu [u]"pense antes de atirar"[/u], não basta apenas sabe atirar e também necessário usa a cabeça, a maioria das coisas utiliza a própria física para matar, como objetos pesados caindo de cima, lança um objeto que corta e etc...

[b]OBS.:[/b]Existe [b]Half-Life 2: Update[/b] criado pela comunidade que é o mesmo jogo, mas com o gráfico melhorado.

[h1]Positivo:[/h1]
[list]
[*]Surgimento da engine [b]Source[/b]
[*]Pense
[*]Longa e ótima historia
[b]OBS.:[/b]depois deste jogo continua no Half-Life 2: Episodio 1, mas infelizmente são bem curtas. 
[*]Física Realista 
[*]Engine com código aberto, significa que é facilmente modicado, surgindo mod como [b]Zombie Panic! Source[/b] e [b]Half-Life 2: Update[/b]
[/list]

[h1]Negativo:[/h1]
[list]
[*]O que é mira de ferro
[*]Nunca terminaram a historia
[*][strike]Valve, criadora do jogo e da Steam, é alérgico ao numero 3[/strike]

[/list]

[h1]Nota:[strike][3][/strike]5/5[/h1]
Um ótimo jogo, principalmente o primeiro, que agora possui engine [b]source[/b] algum dia finalmente a história estará completa[strike] ou não[/strike]

[b]Bônus:[/b]

[url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/290930/]Half-Life 2 com gráfico melhorado[/url]

[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iBQ5akm6Nwo&list=PLfS2RWrUAp735WnPzWXAmh3Kqh_hA8snP&index=1]Historia completa de Half-Life + DLC[/url]

We remember the Freeman. We are coterminous. There is no distance between us. No false veils of time or space may intervene. We see you still in Black Mesa. Clearly we see you in the Nihilanth's chamber. We bear witness to the bright eternity of the Nihilanth's demise. You leap, you fall, we see you flash between the barriers. We are there still, in observance of your final stroke. While our own lay scattered at your feet, you severed the vortal cord that bound the Nihilanth to life, and to us. That sharp spur of hope has not dulled to this day. For once the lesser master lay defeated, we knew the greater must also fall in time.

For a brief time you joined with us. You are one. Between the worlds. Communion of the Vortessence. And that other: a deeper mystery. No deeper than the void itself. We cannot forget those whose cords you cut. Forgiveness is not ours to bestow. Unity of purpose, the shattering of common shackles, a single road we tread. Your song we sing and shall sing for eternity. No matter the consequences of this struggle. You have brought us grief and jubilation beyond measure. With you beside us, a talisman of victory, the day of freedom draws nigh.

Your bright face obscures your darker mask. We call you sib, although your mind and meaning are a mystery to us. Far distant eyes look out through yours. Something secret steers us both. We shall not name it. We have endured these chafing bonds for eons, yet a single moment of further servitude seems intolerable! How often have we slipped our yoke, only to find it choking us again. Let this war end in either total victory or our extinction. No further compromise shall we allow. We take our stand beside you, here, upon this miserable rock.

The way ahead is dark for the moment. What seems to you a sacrifice is merely, to us, an oscillation. We do not fear the interval of darkness. We are a tapestry woven of Vortessence. It is the same for you if only you would see it. How many are there in you? Whose hopes and dreams do you encompass? Could you but see the eyes inside your own, the minds in your mind, you would see how much we share.

 We are you, Freeman. And you are us.
It's a good game.I recommend you buy and play it.

One of my favorite games of all time and i'm pretty sure most people would say the same. Played it when when i got steam. My dad played it first mostly (since then has retired because, well, raging lol. I just love the story. playing it over and over. I have it on my ps3. I use to play the whole series once a month for like 3 years. I had a schedule when i played. Come home from school friday ( do homework first , or didn't have any) Play half life 2  then it ends at 9pm or something. Next day 5am play episode 1 then after that i start episode 2. always ended at 12pm. I wish i could do this now but can't cause im F u c k ing working friday nights and saturday nights. I have a good time when i'm scheduling it, because it's like nostaliga for me. Btw i can't spell cause im reveiwing most games in my account. Half life: Alyx. Won't be playing that until i get out of the military probabley. valve is trolling everyone to buy a $1000 vr headset which i don't care. never played half life 1 ever. I started playing blackmesa last year. but stopped cause they didn't have the xen maps and the game has been out for ike 6 years lmao. Anyways i will always enjoy this game as long as valve can count to 3 which will be soon...
